name: Lefty & Righty
description:
Made for the  Mini Jam 52: Summit in72 hours.

The limitation was: You can only use WASD and the Arrow keys.
I hope you'll enjoy it ^^
There's a lot of stuff I'd like to add, but right now, I'm kinda happy with the result !

Controls:

- WASD: move Lefty
- Arrows: move Righty
- Double tap one of these keys: attack

In the future, maybe:

- random dungeons (almost)
- traps, swarms of enemies
- bonfire to unlock ton of perks
find treasures
- collect keys to open doors and chests
choose next type of dungeon
- finish a dungeon to unlock characters/perks
- difficulty increasing with levels

My own record was 150 ...
